column3: Concept ACK, I'd be planning on starting some of this. As you may have noticed I have some lists of possible changes in #8875.

Yup, there's likely some more fallbacks that could be removed.\n\nHowever I think the filesystem filebacks are especially bad. In one case (Qt) the behavior of the fallback is just plain wrong in the case of unicode, the other case looks like fragile, hardly-tested code but is luckily in the tests only.

Updated - there as another one in wallet.cpp, which I skipped over because it used `BOOST_VERSION` instead of `BOOST_FILESYSTEM_VERSION` as distinguisher.\n\nThat should cover them all - in my post here https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/8875#issuecomment-278921336 I've listed the remaining ones, which all deal with newer versions (and non filesystem).

utACK 056aba2

This removes all our uses of BOOST_FILESYSTEM_VERSION.
We're also down to 3 uses of BOOST_VERSION in /src.
